title: Deluxe Room
description: Experience comfortable and spacious living with modern amenities, premium bedding, and thoughtful services designed for a relaxing stay. Perfect for business travelers, couples, and leisure guests.
listDescription: Spacious accommodation with modern amenities, premium bedding, and complimentary breakfast for a comfortable stay.
detailDescription:
Our Deluxe Rooms offer a perfect blend of comfort and functionality, designed for travelers seeking quality accommodation with all essential amenities. The 600 sq. ft. space features elegant d√©cor, warm lighting, and a serene atmosphere that ensures a restful experience.

Wake up to a complimentary breakfast and enjoy a productive day with high-speed WiFi, or relax watching your favorite shows on the LED TV. The room is equipped with modern conveniences including electronic key cards for enhanced security, tea/coffee makers for your convenience, and a safety locker for valuables. With 24x7 hot and cold water supply and premium toiletries, every detail is curated for your comfort.

title: Suite
description: Elevate your stay with our spacious Suite featuring a separate dining area, premium amenities, and elegant interiors. Ideal for extended stays, family vacations, and guests seeking extra comfort.
listDescription: Spacious suite with separate dining area, premium amenities, and elegant interiors for an elevated stay experience.
detailDescription:
Our Suite offers 800 sq. ft. of luxurious living space, thoughtfully designed for guests who appreciate extra room and premium amenities. The separate dining area provides the perfect setting for intimate meals or small gatherings, while the elegant interiors create a sophisticated atmosphere.

The suite features a well-appointed minibar, comfortable king-size bed, and all modern conveniences for a seamless stay. Enjoy high-speed internet connectivity, premium entertainment options, and 24-hour services. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, the Suite provides the perfect balance of luxury and functionality, with additional space to work, relax, or entertain.
